Posts.Content: FMCGrandma wrote: Just wondering if anyone else has armpit/shoulder pain many years after lymph node removal??   If I lift something (or someone) heavy, it really hurts the next day.  And my surgery was back in l995! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Armpit/shoulder pain 16 yrs. after lumpectomy?? FMCGrandma Binney4
